def calculate_distinct_values(n, m, program, queries):
    x = 1
    L = [0]
    M = [(0, 0)]
    mi = 0
    ma = 0
    for j in range(n):
        if program[j] == '-':
            x -= 1
        else:
            x += 1
        mi = min(mi, x)
        ma = max(ma, x)
        M.append((mi, ma))
        L.append(x)
    N = [(L[-1], L[-1])]
    (mi, ma) = (L[-1], L[-1])
    for j in reversed(range(n)):
        mi = min(mi, L[j])
        ma = max(ma, L[j])
        N.append((mi, ma))
    results = []
    for (a, b) in queries:
        (X, Y) = M[a - 1]
        (K, P) = N[n - b]
        if b < n:
            X = min(K - (L[b] - L[a - 1]), X)
            Y = max(P - (L[b] - L[a - 1]), Y)
        results.append(Y - X + 1)
    return results
